text: Dominique Follacci (born 18 May 1879, date of death unknown) was a French gymnast. He competed in the men's artistic individual all-around event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==Life and career== Follaci was interested in sports from childhood. He become a director of the Languedocienne Gymnastics Society. He received several prizes while presenting this organization in competitions like Dijon 1899, Paris 1900, Nice 1901. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Annaba
title: Dominique Follacci
